target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_probability(total_outcomes, favorable_outcomes):
    prob_all_different = Rational(favorable_outcomes, total_outcomes)
    return 1 - prob_all_different
target.description: Calculate the probability that at least two specified outcomes occur using complementary probability concepts.
target.name: calculate_probability

target.description: Evaluate probabilities associated with rolling dice or similar games.
target.name: evaluate_probability

target.description: Calculate the arrangements of distinct items considering duplicates.
target.name: calculate_arrangements

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_expected_rolls(days, p_rolls):
    expected_per_day = Rational(6, 5)  # Expected rolls per day
    return days * expected_per_day
target.description: Calculate the expected number of rolls given specific outcomes and total days.
target.name: calculate_expected_rolls
